title: Invasion
description: This book has more than one point of view. If you prefer to avoid multiple perspectives, this book may not be your cup of tea.Alyssa is finally sixteen-years-old and is excited to have more of her powers. For most of her life, she has always been drawn to Alan's sword, and she was thankful to learn five years ago precisely why that was. What she didn't expect was to find out that she and the sword are connected in more ways than one. When the biggest threat the community has ever had to face takes place, it falls on her shoulders to protect the community and all of Zartoto. Does she have what it takes?
author: Callie Woodridge
